title: Drawing, "Three Putti with Garland; Romulus and Remus Breastfeeding from She-Wolf; Two Putti Playing Cymbals", 1818
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and brown wash on paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 89, monum del cinquecento Bologna; on verso: 1818
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Three Putti with Garland; Romulus and Remus Breastfeeding from She-Wolf; Two Putti Playing Cymbals", 1818.
1818. Pen and black ink, brush and brown wash on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3549.
